name: crimeinvestigationteam
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: crime investigation
des: Be in the detective's shoes and enquire, interrogate , investigate various people involved in the case to find clues and finally accuse any suspect in the shortest time. Compete against friends in this logic based mystery game.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
